iti75:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaññeva na dātā hoti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avuṭṭhikasamo hoti.
iti75:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccānaṃ dātā hoti, ekaccānaṃ na dātā hoti samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassī hoti.
iti75:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesaṃva deti, samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikavanibbakayācakānaṃ annaṃ pānaṃ vatthaṃ yānaṃ mālāgandhavilepanaṃ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṃ.
iti75:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthābhivassī hoti.
iti75:7.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
iti75:13.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
